data.actual_result: The embed's footer/author name is cut off.
data.expected_result: The embed should stretch accordingly to the word size/based on the size of the discord window  or atleast flow to a new line like the rest.
data.short_description: Rich Embeds from Bots with long single word footers/author names/title are cut off.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a Rich Embed builder - Add a very long single word to either the footer or the author name - let the Bot post the embed.
